entity.description: White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders

text:
@CurtisHouck @PressSec @kayleighmcenany @newsbusters The vast majority of protesters wore masks. 
They were OUTSIDE protests--the risk is a lot lower. 

You're an apologist for a racist and a man who ordered coronavirus testing to be slowed down because the number of cases was making him look bad.

You're deplorable.
